title: As D.C. Fêtes Narendra Modi, His Political Prisoners in India Are Forgotten
description:
The Biden administration has ignored India’s rights violations in favor of weapons sales and geopolitical expediency.

title: Ukraine Blocks Journalists From Front Lines With Escalating Censorship
